titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the scope of item 806.30 thereof.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/3/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exclude from their reduced duty rates any waste or scrap of iron, steel, copper, zinc, or aluminum or of alloys of any such metals that is exported from the United States, processed abroad, and reexported to the United States.
